wikipedia_page.main: Richard J. Simmonds (born 2 August 1944) is a retired English Conservative Party politician.  He was a Member of the European Parliament (MEP) for Midlands West 1979 to 1984 and then for Wight and Hampshire East from 1984 to 1994.
